title: Enjoy Alvida Song From Rangoon | Ft. Shahid, Saif & Kangana Ranaut
text: Enjoy Alvida Song From Rangoon | Ft. Shahid, Saif & Kangana Ranaut By tweet Enjoy the brand new track Alvida from the upcoming period war drama film Rangoon . The situational song features the lead characters â€“ Shahid Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan and Kangana Ranaut. The track is crooned by Arijit Singh and composed by Vishal Bhardwaj, while the lyrics are penned by Gulzar. Enjoy the track right here: Enjoy Alvida Song From Rangoon | Ft. Shahid, Saif And Kangana Ranaut Produced under the banners Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment, VB Pictures and Viacom 18 Motion Pictures, Rangoon is set to hit the screens on 24th February, 2017.
